website_summaries.verdict: This casual shoe from Merrell, the Merrell Brevard Lace, with its EVA midsole provides great comfort and stability for the foot. Its M Select GRIP provides great traction and grip. The shoe offers versatility when it comes to style and allows the wearer to use the shoe along with various outfit choices.
pros: A majority of the reviewers were satisfied about how the Merrell Brevard Lace feels so comfortable on their foot
The shoe was lighter than expected, said a handful of buyers
A good number of users were highly appreciative of the versatility of the shoe
The shoe was comfortable right out of the box, according to most of the reviewers
Some of the reviewers loved that the shoe is really accommodating especially to those who have wide feet
One user expressed how the shoe is better than other office-type shoes since it provides great grip especially on slippery grounds
The shoe didn’t need a break-in period, according to a user
Most of the buyers said that they would definitely recommend the shoe
A variety of colorways for the shoe is available to choose from
cons: A few reviewers pointed out that the Merrell Brevard Lace easily falls apart even just after a few weeks of use
The shoe is sold at a slightly expensive price

customer_reviews.title: Very good support and cushioning
customer_reviews.text: Fit me perfectly. Replaced an old Timberland model I had for years, which is no longer made. These Merrell's are extremely comfy. Fit well. Very good support and cushioning. Good tread for a good grip. But not a full blown hiking shoe. I liked them so much I bought a black pair and a brown pair.
customer_reviews.author: BobV

customer_reviews.title: They provide me with an excellent fit and always wear well
customer_reviews.text: Merrell have been my "go to" shoes for the last 10 years. They provide me with an excellent fit and always wear well. I have always wished that for the money the shoes had a better insole. I always pitch the ones provided and replace with "Superfeet" or something with more support and impact absorption. Otherwise GREAT Shoes.
customer_reviews.author: naturelover

customer_reviews.title: Great walkers
customer_reviews.text: I would be hard pressed to wear any brand of shoe other than Merrell on a daily basis. After 20 years of wearing different styles of Merrell shoes, they have all served me well: proper fit, comfortable, and durable. All the models I have bought do not have metal in the soles, and as someone who is always traveling by air, this is an important characteristic. As I am always walking through tough urban terrain, I apply additional waterproofing spray, and it helps maintain both appearance and useful life.
customer_reviews.author: pwnaka

customer_reviews.title: Merrell makes the best shoes hands down
customer_reviews.text: Merrell makes the best shoes hands down. These are comfortable and look nice. Just note that the "brindle" color is a bit greenish. I thought the picture made them look brownish and I almost considered returning them because of that. But they are just so damn comfortable I had to keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Campfield

customer_reviews.title: and they are reasonably comfortable, but the right shoe squeaks with each step
customer_reviews.text: The shoes seem to be of high quality, and they are reasonably comfortable, but the right shoe squeaks with each step. Baby powder did not help. Kind of annoying, but other than that I like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Mayton

customer_reviews.title: Image color not actual
customer_reviews.text: Reading previous comments I was aware the color is more olive green than brown, so I was not surprised or bothered by this. Just want others to be aware. This is a very nice, quality looking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: RJKM

customer_reviews.title: even though they were in good shape, I am pretty sure they were a ...
customer_reviews.text: Most uncomfortable pair of $100 shoes I've tried. Also, even though they were in good shape, I am pretty sure they were a previously returned pair as they had slight dirt granules wedged between the leather and sole.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prior near-identical pair from same manufacturer were wider.
customer_reviews.text: Loved my Merrill Brevards. This item nearly identical except for outer material. But this one fit lot tighter (at same labelled size) and I had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe. Firm foundation yet very comfy fit like ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe. Firm foundation yet very comfy fit like a good running shoe. Thick insole makes the difference. They look good for work or a night out & never tire out the feet. Get 'em.
customer_reviews.author: Mocat

customer_reviews.title: now I have (2) pairs of favorite shoes. Regret it took so long for me ...
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd pair of Merrell shoes, now I have (2) pairs of favorite shoes. Regret it took so long for me to stumble across such quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B.

customer_reviews.title: Merrell shoe sizes seem to be consistent. Unlike some ...
customer_reviews.text: Merrell shoe sizes seem to be consistent. Unlike some other brands with Merrell I can order on line and know that I won’t have to send it back for a different size.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest C. Schank

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable "out-of-the-box" shoe I've ever worn. Not stiff, no break-in period.....love 'em
customer_reviews.author: Kamillean

customer_reviews.title: Brindle color may come with stitched version.
customer_reviews.text: Size: I am usually choose 2E, so this D is a little bit narrow for me, but still okay. Note: You may receive stitched toe version. I chose the "plane" toe Brindle, but True Value Center sent me "stitched" toe. I keep it because I like it too. If you really want plane toe, you probably choose another seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shoe did not look right and was the wrong color.  I did not wear it.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe did not look right and was the wrong color. I did not wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Husband is picky about shoes... Returned 2 before getting these He likes them!!! He has a high arch.
customer_reviews.author: Piedmont1fa

customer_reviews.title: Nice, comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice, comfortable shoe, but if you're looking for the Brindle colorway, beware, as it's not the one piece toe as shown in the picture. It's the toe with the panel across the front as seen in the other two colorways. Not as attractive in my opinion. I reported the issue, so hopefully they'll change the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Merrill Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for the work I do. I walked 22,000 steps in them last night.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and attractive shoe! And the price was great!
customer_reviews.author: homebrew

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I would like to return them. They are not a natural fawn color. They are a pail green😣
customer_reviews.author: Duece1975

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for all day wear
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for all day wear. A little lighter and more olive than dark brown shown, but still goes with most anything.
customer_reviews.author: S. McCoy

customer_reviews.title: My ordered size 10D fits good, not too tight
customer_reviews.text: My ordered size 10D fits good, not too tight. I have to lace up tight to have the shoe not slip around. Good shoe. I have had other Merrels styles and they have been long lasting and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Felkins

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable as expected from Merrell. My third pair of shoes from them. All good!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Nolin

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Merrells. I just love how comfortable they are and how well they wear. Merrell shoes are now my goto brand for shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were olive green. I expected light tan and returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the shoe, and wore it daily to my desk job, that does require me to do some walking. But after about 8 months the fit became really loose and the padding on the back heel broke apart. Wish it would was built a little more durable because the show still looks pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Buys Alot

customer_reviews.title: No heel
customer_reviews.text: The Brevard Oxford Fashion Sneaker has hardly any heel, and comes a little too large. Very uncomfortable walking shoe for a Merrell. I'm surprised, since they usually make a quality comfortable shoe. I'm switching to a Merrell Berner Shift Lace Fashion Sneaker. The Proterra were great fitting shoes, but Merrell stopped making them.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Pascoe

product_meta.title: Merrell Men's Brevard Lace Fashion Sneakers
product_meta.description: Stay connected to the trail in the Brevard rugged casual lace-up—the comfort and protection you love in a streamlined design
feature_bullets: Nubuck leather oxford with M SELECT DRY upper that seals out water and lets moisture escape
Breathable lining treated with M SELECT FRESH odor-controlling properties
